channel.title: Could anyone help me with this exception?
channel.description:
Everytime I walk through varrock, it'll be fine for a second and then it'll crash the client.
This is the error it's throwing...
[img]http://i.imgur.com/5kfkdFX.png?1[/img]
I apologize guys it's been 2 years since I've even taken a second look at RSPS, so excuse me if this is a really easy fix lol. :P

item.title: Could anyone help me with this exception?
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

Do you change something before this error or did the error come with the client?

Read full topic
item.source: Could anyone help me with this exception?
